title: The Wizard of Waterdeep
content: getting rid of the tadpoles and the Netherbrain. Seek Mystra in the final cutscene where she commends you for your heroic act of turning Illithid and for becoming the inheritor of Karsus' powers. Surrender the Crown and the Karsite Weave to her and she will offer to restore your life and soul, if you are willing to leave the mortal realms and return with her, to Elysium.
